messages.message:
Team, SC has a request for adding healthcheck to stats-collector containers. https://instabase.zendesk.com/agent/tickets/3364
I can see that the stats-collector listens on 9080 and a HTTP GET request to / at port 9080 of the container seems to be sending 200 when the container is ready.
Can we send the following configuration to SC:
```livenessProbe:
  httpGet:
    path: /
    port: 9080
  initialDelaySeconds: 30
  timeoutSeconds: 5
readinessProbe:
  httpGet:
    path: /
    port: 9080
  initialDelaySeconds: 10
  timeoutSeconds: 2```

hey @sada - thanks for reaching out,  this service has a health check server also built in and that would be preferable to use (or a tcp check for port 9080 in case the health check is unavailable). will move this thread to <#C01DJ7QDC2H|> for further discussion.

https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C01DJ7QDC2H/p1651207167359549
